scripts.pretrain_text module¶

Trains an unsupervised layer on text data.

Use to build individual layers of the text stack. Choose your labels carefully! There is no automated mechanism as of yet to keep track of what is what.

You can build layers on top of already trained layers by simply selecting the labels for the previous layers. Unless --no_transform_corpus and --no_transform_dataset flags are given, the source corpus and dataset will be at the end run through the trained model and saved with the --transformation_label label.

scripts.pretrain_text.main(args)[source]¶
